name: CardNinja
tag_list: smartphone-wallet, thin-wallet, wallet, accessories, accessory, smart-phone, iphone, android, windows, blackberry
overview:
CardNinja designed and manufactures a thin wallet that attaches to nearly any smartphone or smartphone case.

It enables you to combine up to 8 credit cards, IDs & cash with their smartphone.
